# toCoordinateRegion()

**Instance Method**

Returns the coordinate region that corresponds to the calling bounding region.

## Declaration

```swift
toCoordinateRegion(): CoordinateRegion;
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CoordinateRegion] that corresponds to the calling [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/BoundingRegion].

## Copying and converting regions

- **copy()**: Returns a copy of the calling bounding region.
